product_name: Stonewear Designs Liberty Pants - Women's Petite - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Made from soft, quick-drying stretch fabric, the women's petite Liberty Pants from Stonewear Designs feature a slim, flattering bootleg cut that supports your body's every asana. Quick-drying polyester/spandex fabric offers amazing stretch and comfort. Lined gusset and wide waistband. Stonewear Designs Liberty Pants in petite sizes have a hidden pocket on the back for a small music player. Closeout.
short_description: Made from soft, quick-drying stretch fabric, the women's petite Liberty Pants from Stonewear Designs feature a slim, flattering bootleg cut that supports your body's every asana.
